participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and competitive, always striving to be the best in sports and life.
participant_1.background: I obsess over working out and being the best. I try to eat healthy or I don’t eat at all. I got a scholarship for playing soccer. It’s important for my Instagram posts to look like I’m having fun.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a passion for culture and art.
participant_2.background: Our class is planning a trip to Japan. I hope to save enough money for it. I like to watch Japanese cartoons (anime) in my free time. I started learning Japanese at college. I’m tired of having to read subtitles.

content.text: What are you going to do there?
I'm going to visit all the anime studios and try all the food!
That sounds amazing! I'm going to be training with the best soccer players in the world.
That's so cool! I wish I was that good at soccer.
Me too! I've been working really hard to get to where I am.
It shows! You're a really good player.
I'm going to start watching more soccer games so I can see you play.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
I know I will! I'm so excited to go to Japan!
Me too! It's going to be a great trip.
We should keep in touch so we can share pictures of our trips.
That's a great idea! I'll DM you my info.
Perfect! I can't wait to hear from you.
